sentences.sContent: General Motors and Chrysler will be forced into bankruptcy early next year if they do not present a government-appointed "car tsar" with viable restructuring plans, the White House warned today.
sentences.sContent_eng: General Motors and Chrysler will be forced into bankruptcy early next year if they do not present a government-appointed "car tsar" with viable restructuring plans, the White House warned today.
sentences.sCn: 白宫今天警告道：如果通用汽车和克莱斯勒未能给在政府指派的“汽车沙皇”提供一系列的重组计划的话，他们在明年早些时候将会破产。

trans.tranOther: a male ruler of Russia before
